chatbot.title: Help
chatbot.intro: Hi, this is Alkemio’s automated guidance chat. It can provide you with answers based on Alkemio’s documentation. What are you looking for?

infoDialog.title: Alkemio Help
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get answers to your questions about the platform. This __AI-powered personal assistant__ allows you to interact with content from the Alkemio Help Center. It will also provide the sources of the answers.

Want to know more? Click [here](https://alkem.io/vc/guidance) to visit its profile!

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemio’s documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

references.title: New user? Visit our Getting Started pages!
Find your answers in the Help Center or FAQ

releaseNotes.title: <small><icon/>Our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> have been updated. Click on the titles to review them, or dismiss this notification.</small>

cookie.consent: By clicking "Accept All Cookies", you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation and analyze site usage.
cookie.settings: When visiting a website, information can be stored on your browser in the form of cookies. This information can be about you, your preferences and your device. Mostly, this information is used to make the website work as good as possible. Some websites use it for marketing purposes. As Alkemio does not allow any advertisement on its website, we only distinguish two types of cookies.
cookie.technical: Technically necessary cookies: enable you to navigate and use the basis functions and to store preferences.
cookie.analysis: Analysis cookies: enable us to determine how visitors interact with our services in order to improve user experience.

memberSettings.title: Member Settings
memberSettings.lead: This member is a lead: Leads are shown as the hosts of the Community.
memberSettings.admin: This member is an admin: (s)he has the right to administer this community and all of its content and contributors.
memberSettings.maxLeadsWarning: Note that there is a specific maximum number of leads for the communities. If the maximum number if reached, this option will be disabled for others.

removeMember.remove: Click here to remove this user from this Community. Be careful, this action cannot be undone.

removeMember.dialogContent: By clicking CONFIRM, {{member}} will be removed from this Community and all the underlying Subspaces {{memberFirstName}} may be member of. {{memberFirstName}}’s contributions will remain in place.

removeGuidelinesConfirmationDialog.title: Remove Community Guidelines Content
removeGuidelinesConfirmationDialog.content: Are you sure you want to remove the Community Guidelines? This action cannot be undone.

accessForbidden.title: Content not available
accessForbidden.description: We apologize, but the content you requested is not available. It may have been deleted, or you may not have the permission to access it, such as if it was put in draft mode.

callout.closed: This discussion is closed so you can no longer comment

callout.delete-confirm-text: All Posts, Whiteboards and messages under the Callout will also be deleted.

alkemio.description: Share this {{entity}} directly with other Alkemio users. You can search for Alkemio users below and attach a personalized message.

Hi!

I would like to share this {{entity}} with you.

Have a look!

background.title: Background
background.description: Give a brief overview of how this Subspace was identified and how it is embedded in the wider picture.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: What will this Subspace change? How will people and organizations be affected, for good or bad?

who.title: Who is involved?

shareSettings.description: Based on the settings of the Space that this Whiteboard is in, you can edit with multiple users at once. If you do not want others to edit, change the settings below.
shareSettings.disabled: Based on the settings of the Space that this Whiteboard is in, real-time collaboration is not enabled. This means that only one user can edit at a time.

searchScope.alternativeScope: Didn’t find what you were looking for? Try searching in:

journeyUnauthorizedDialog.message: This is a private Community and most of it’s content is restricted to members only. If you want to join, click here to apply.

stateEditor.invalidChars: A phase name cannot contain special characters.
stateEditor.noRepeatedStates: A phase with the same name already exists.

confirmationDialog.title: Be careful when changing the flow!
confirmationDialog.description:
- By changing the Innovation Flow, **all changes made to the current flow will be lost**.
- All existing collaboration tools will be grouped under the first phase of the new flow.

importCalloutsDialog.title: Apply New Template
importCalloutsDialog.description:
You are about to apply a new template. This action will permanently delete your current Innovation Flow. However, the existing collaboration tools linked to different phases will remain and be grouped under the first phase of the new setup.

Please choose one of the following options:
importCalloutsDialog.yesDescription: This will include the new collaboration tools from the template in addition to your existing ones.
importCalloutsDialog.noDescription: This will replace only the Innovation Flow, keeping your current collaboration tools as they are.

activity-tooltip.headline: Alkemio is growing! In total, the platform now hosts:

callout-creation.title: What do you want to ask your community?

info-step.title: Details
info-step.type-comments-help: Select ‘Comments’ when you want people to answer in a simple text format, like a message board.
info-step.type-posts-help: Select Posts when you want people to answer in a card format.
info-step.type-whiteboards-help: Select ‘Whiteboards’ when you want people to answer on a visual whiteboard, allowing them to draw and use text.

template-step.title: Templates

info-step.title: Details
info-step.tags-help-text: Add free form tags to help quickly convey the key information about the Post. Good tags also help make the Post easier to find in searches.

create-step.explanation: By completing this step the Post will be created and you will have the option to add visuals.

visuals-step.title: Visuals
visuals-step.headline: Congratulations, you have now successfully created an Post!
visuals-step.explanation: To further personalize your Post, please consider adding visuals such as a Banner to the Post.
visuals-step.bottom-note: You will still have the possibility to change these visuals under the settings tab as well as adding attachments and a Banner for the Dashboard card.

alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.content: This credential allows the holder to prove that they are a verified Alkemio user.

alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.title: Alkemio Community Member
alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.content: This credential allows the holder to prove that they are a member of the specified community within Alkemio.

dialog-apply-parent.title: Apply to {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-apply-parent.body: To join '{{subspaceName}}' you must join '{{spaceName}}' Space first. Please add the Subspace you want to join in the Spaces' application form.

dialog-parent-app-pending.title: Parent application pending!
dialog-parent-app-pending.body: To join {{subspaceName}}' you must join '{{spaceName}}' Space first. There is already an application pending for that '{{spaceName}}', so you can also submit a parallel application for '{{subspaceName}}'.

apply.body: Thanks for applying to our community!

dialog-join-parent.title: Join {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-join-parent.body: You can join this community without applying for a membership, but first you have to join {{parentCommunityName}} and accept the terms and conditions there.

backdrop.private: Interested in reading more? Please sign in or join if you are not yet a member of this {{blockName}}!
backdrop.authentication: Please sign in to see details about the {{blockName}}.

referenceSegment.title: References
referenceSegment.description: Please keep in mind that all the files you attach here become publicly available. If you only want the members of this Space to be able to access the files, attach it to a post or a collection of links on one of the member pages.
referenceSegment.url-helper-text: <terms>Click here</terms> for the terms and conditions.
referenceSegment.plaintext-helper-text: Click here for the terms and conditions. You can upload Word, PDF, Excel, or images up to 15 MB

editSpaceForm.read-access: Allow read access for non-space members to Subspaces

deleteEntity.title: Danger Zone
deleteEntity.description: Click here to delete this {{entity}}. Be careful, this action cannot be undone.

confirmDialog.title: Confirm {{entity}} Deletion
confirmDialog.description: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible. You can only delete a {{entity}} if there are no underlying Subspaces associated with it. If there are any Subspaces within this page, please delete them first (you can do so from the {{entity}} settings > Subspaces page).
confirmDialog.descriptionShort: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible.
confirmDialog.checkbox: Please check this box if you are certain about deleting this {{entity}}

communityUpdates.title: Let your community know what's next

remove.confirmationContent: Removing a community update is an irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue?

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.help: The Spaces and Subspaces that this organization is contributing to

discussion.cant-post: You can't reply to this discussion

description.title: Comment on this discussion
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

tooltip.markdown-help:
You can add formatting to your comment,
for example:
Bold text: **bold**
Italic text: *italic*
Header: ##Title
Link: [text](url)
tooltip.mentions: Type a few characters to find relevant users

vcInteractions.disclaimer: Create a new comment to interact with another VC.
vcInteractions.help: You can only interact with one Virtual Contributor per thread (comment + 'sub’comments). If you’d like to engage with another VC, start a new thread by creating a comment in the bottom input field.

description.title: Further information
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

discussions.no-data-create: No discussions. Create a new discussion
discussions.no-data-join: No discussions. Please join the community to create a discussion

COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.subject: {{spaceName}} - New {{calloutType}} is published "{{calloutName}}", have a look!
COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.description: {{contributorName}} published a new {{calloutType}} in {{spaceType}}: {{spaceName}}, with name: {{calloutName}}.

COMMUNICATION_USER_MENTION.subject: {{commenterName}} mentioned you in a comment on {{calloutName}}:

COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.subject: {{spaceName}} - Welcome to the Community!
COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.description:
Thank you for joining {{spaceName}}!
You can now start contributing to the various posts and whiteboards, further deepen your knowledge about this topic, and connect with other Contributors.

COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER_ADMIN.subject: {{memberType}} "{{memberName}}" joined {{spaceName}}
COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER_ADMIN.description: The {{memberType}} {{memberName}} has joined {{spaceName}}, of which you are an admin.

spaceWelcomeDialog.title: 🎉 Your Space is Ready!
spaceWelcomeDialog.description:
Now, make it your own:
⚙ Set it up – Customize your structure and settings.
📝 Add content - Create whiteboards, posts, and more.
🤝 Invite collaborators – Find the invitations in the Space Settings.
📚 Need help? Tutorials are available in your Space if you chose to include them.

✨ Want more features? Upgrade to Plus or Premium anytime - just contact our team!

innovationHub.foreignJourney: This {{journey}} is not in the selection of {{space}}. You are anyway very welcome to contribute. Enjoy exploring!

outsideOfSpace.forum: This is the general Alkemio Forum, outside of the {{space}} space. You are very much invited to explore and contribute!
outsideOfSpace.subspaces: Here you can find all Subspaces that are hosted on Alkemio, also the ones that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy exploring!
outsideOfSpace.contributors: Here you can find all people and organizations that are contributing on Alkemio, also in Spaces that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy connecting!

innovationHub.goToMainPage: Interested in collaborating in other Spaces? Click here to see them all on the universal Alkemio homepage.

dashboard.description: Here you can see the summary for this {{entity}}. Navigate through the other tabs to see more detailed information!

about.description: Here you can explore the context of this {{entity}}, as well as the community.

explore.description: Here you can contribute your insights to understanding the context. It is about surfacing up the wisdom of the community.

discussions.description: Here you can read and participate in discussions around this {{entity}}.

whiteboards.description: Whiteboards can be seen as digital whiteboards. Here you can create a whiteboard for this {{entity}} as well as find ones created by the others.

subEntities.description: Here you can explore the hosted **{{entities}}**. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.

archived-notice.archived-space: This Space is currently archived. Interested in bringing it back to life? <contact>Click here</contact> to contact Alkemio.
archived-notice.archived-journey: This {{journey}} is under a currently archived Space. Interested in bringing it back to life? <contact>Click here</contact> to contact Alkemio.

demo-notice.demo-space: This is a Demo Space. <alkemio>Click here</alkemio> to collaborate in active Spaces.
demo-notice.demo-journey: This {{journey}} is within a Demo Space. <alkemio>Click here</alkemio> to collaborate in active Spaces.

contribute.initial-text: In the Knowledge Base you will find relevant documents, insights and other materials about the topic. The leads of the Space can provide the content, but also community members can contribute.

innovationFlow.title: This {{entity}} is guided by the {{innovationFlowDisplayName}}. This innovation flow structures the process and invites you to take specified actions per stage.

innovationLibrary.title: Template Library on Alkemio is here to guide your way to impact
innovationLibrary.subtitle: Open the template packs below to explore all the Whiteboard templates, post templates and innovation flows you can use. If you want to know more <click>click here</click>.
innovationLibrary.useTemplateButton: Access this template from your Space to use it.

defaultCollaborationTemplate.title: Change Default Subspace Template

Customize the default template for newly created Subspaces.

Below you can choose between the templates collected in the Space Templates library. If you’re looking to create new templates or explore additional templates, click here to access this library.

preferences.subtitle: This section allows you to modify the $t(common.space) authorization preferences

preferences.title: Membership
preferences.subtitle: This section allows you to modify the $t(common.space) membership preferences

notifications.errorCreatingSpace: An error occurred while creating the Space.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.public: Public: This space and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a member.
visibility.private: Private: This space is visible to everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible to members. Please note that both the information in the profile and the context are publicly visible.
visibility.publicSubspace: Public: This Subspace and all its contents are visible to everyone who has access to the Space it belongs to. If the Space itself is public, this Subspace and its contents will be visible to all users, including those outside the Space.
visibility.privateSubspace: Private: This Subspace is visible to all members of the Space, but its contents are restricted and can only be accessed by members of the Subspace. No application required: All Space members can directly join, without you having to review their application.

membership.title: Membership
membership.open: No Application required: All Space members can directly join, without you having to review their application.
membership.applications: Application required: If people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitations: Invitation only: Users can only become a member after you’ve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host organization: Allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembers: Space invitations: Allow admins of Subspaces to invite users to their Subspace. Users who were not yet a member of this Space, will become so when they accept the Subspace invitation.

memberActions.title: Allowed Actions
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: Allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createSubspaces: Create Subspaces: Allow members to create Subspaces in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Subspaces yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Subspace.
memberActions.eventsFromSubspaces: Subspace events: Allow events from Subspaces to be visible on this Space calendar as well.
memberActions.supportAsAdmin: Alkemio Support: Allow the Alkemio Support team to act as an admin in this Space.

copySpace.title: Copy Subspace
copySpace.description: To utilize this Subspace setup, you can either duplicate it within the same Space or save it as a template for use across the platform. In both scenarios, the innovation flow and all collaboration tools will be replicated. Please note that comments or contributions to a tool will not be included in the template or duplicated Subspace.
copySpace.createTemplateTooltip: To create a template from this Subspace, you need Space admin permissions.

account.vc-section-title: Virtual Contributors created from this Space

innovation-packs.save-new-for-details: Save the new Template Pack to edit the rest of the details

innovationHubs.success: The Innovation Hub was created successfully!
innovationHubs.saveForMoreDetails: Save the new $t(common.innovation-hub) to edit the rest of the details

exploreSpaces.title: Explore Spaces of Your Interest
exploreSpaces.subtitle: All activity on Alkemio happens inside Spaces and their corresponding Subspaces. Explore both to find topics where you can contribute!
exploreSpaces.caption:
Discover a diverse range of Spaces awaiting your exploration. Whether you're an experienced member or a curious newcomer, there's something here for everyone. Let's delve into the details:
  1. Member Spaces: These are spaces where you already hold membership.
  2. Public Spaces: These spaces have visible content, and you can request to join them.
  3. All Spaces: This category includes both public and private spaces. In private spaces, only limited content is visible, but you can still apply for membership.
exploreSpaces.noSpaceMemberships: You’re not currently a member of any Space. Click here to visit our {{welcomeSpace}}, which is a fantastic starting point for your journey on Alkemio!

search.noResults: No results matched your search terms.

myLatestContributions.title: My Latest Activity
myLatestContributions.noContributions: Your contributions will appear here once you participate in a Space. You can contribute by posting, commenting, or doing other activities.

whiteboardDisconnected.title: Whiteboard connection lost
whiteboardDisconnected.message: Apologies for the inconvenience! The whiteboard isn't available for editing right now, possibly due to a network issue or loss of access. Please try closing and reopening the whiteboard or refreshing the page. If the issue persists, reach out to your Space administrator for assistance.
whiteboardDisconnected.lastSaved: The content of this whiteboard was last saved {{lastSaved}}.
whiteboardDisconnected.offline: You are currently offline. The whiteboard will try to reconnect when you are back online.

readonlyReason.readonly: View only mode click here to learn why
readonlyReason.contentUpdatePolicy: You don't have the rights to edit this whiteboard. Ask the owner, <ownerlink>{{ownerName}}</ownerlink>, to change the Share settings if you want to contribute.
readonlyReason.noMembership: You have to be a member of the {{journeyType}} this whiteboard is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <journeylink>join/apply</journeylink>
readonlyReason.unauthenticated: You have to be signed in and a member of the {{journeyType}} this whiteboard is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <signinlink>sign in</signinlink>

reason.inactivity: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because you were inactive for too long. Please try reopening the whiteboard to continue editing.
reason.multiUserNotAllowed: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because this Space only allows one whiteboard editor at a time
reason.roomCapacityReached: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because this Space allows for multiple editors simultaneously, but the maximum is reached
reason.generic:
You can’t edit this Whiteboard for one of the following reasons:

- You were inactive for 2 hours or more
- You are not a member of the Space
- This Space only allows one whiteboard editor at a time
- This Space allows for more editors, but the maximum is reached

login.title: Sign in to Alkemio
login.register: Don’t have an Alkemio account yet? <signup>Click here to sign up.</signup>

about.title: Re-imagining collaboration
about.description: Alkemio puts the Subspaces central, each Subspace providing a central, neutral place for collaboration.

error.title: Ooops!
error.line2: Please check that your server ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) is available, and reload the page.
error.line3: If the error persists please contact support.

errors.LazyLoadError: Network error occurred. Please try reloading the page.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try reloading the page.

four-ou-four.title: Something went wrong...
four-ou-four.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for either doesn't exist or has been moved, or you don't have the rights to access it. This may happen because you aren't a member of the community yet or are not signed in. Don't worry, our team is there to help!

links.faq: Have a look in our FAQ and documentation to find what you are looking for, or contact the team.

registration.header: Create an account to start using Alkemio
registration.introduction:
Welcome to Alkemio! Safe spaces for collaboration, education and professionals.

Alkemio is designed to benefit society. Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue.
registration.terms: I accept the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

accept-terms.introduction:
Alkemio makes it easy to manage Subspaces and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. Subspaces take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
accept-terms.tooltip: Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue

registrationSuccess.message:
The last step is to verify your email address. Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.
If you have not received an email, click here to send it again.
registrationSuccess.continue: …or continue to the platform without signing in

verification-success.header: Thank you for verifying your email address!
verification-success.subheader: Your profile is now fully activated on the platform. Enjoy!
verification-success.message: Please do consider filling out all posts of your profile. It helps with both applying to join communities and with others being able to connect with you.

message.initial: Please enter your email address below to receive a recovery code that will allow to reset your password.

verification.message: To receive a new verification email, please enter your email address below.

verification-required.message:
You are nearly there... One last step is to verify your email.
Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.

If you have not received an email, click on this link to send again.

communities.title: Communities
communities.help: Communities the user is a part of
communities.noMembership: Not a member of any Space or SubSpace yet.

associated-organizations.title: Associated Organizations
associated-organizations.help: Organizations who the user is related to

verifiable-credentials.title: Verifiable Credentials
verifiable-credentials.help: Credentials that the user holds issued by trusted parties

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Answers {{name}} gives are based on the body of knowledge coming from:

personality.title: Basic Prompts & Engine
personality.description: To allow people to interact with the body of knowledge described above, Alkemio uses an engine and a basic set of instructions. These instructions make sure that the Virtual Contributor for example only answers questions using the specified body of knowledge so you can trust the answers it is giving.

context.title: Context
context.description: {{name}} uses the following information from the Space it is invited to so it can provide you with meaningful answers:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: For Alkemio, safeguarding your data is of utmost importance. We are committed to maintaining the security and privacy of your information.
privacy.bullets:
• When interacting with a Virtual Contributor, only the data explicitly specified on the left (Context) is used to generate meaningful answers.
  • Importantly, your (Space) data is not utilized for training the Virtual Contributor.
  • Additionally, please note that questions and answers exchanged with the Virtual Contributor may be visible to the Alkemio team.

personality.description: This Virtual Contributor operates using the following external AI service: OpenAI. All questions submitted to this Virtual Contributor, along with any related comments in a threaded conversation, will be sent to OpenAI. Please be aware that this data may be used to train and improve their model.

privacy.description: At Alkemio, protecting your data is our top priority. We are fully committed to ensuring the security and privacy of your information. Here’s how we handle your data when interacting with a Virtual Contributor (VC):
privacy.bullets:
• Only the content of your question and any related comments in a threaded conversation are shared with the AI service that powers the Virtual Contributor.
  • Please be aware that if the Virtual Contributor is based on an external AI service, such as OpenAI, the data shared may be used to further train and improve that service.
  • Additionally, note that questions and answers exchanged with the Virtual Contributor may be accessible to the Alkemio team for monitoring or support purposes.

membership.title: Virtual Contributor Memberships
membership.noMemberships: This Virtual Contributor is not a member of any space

visibility.public: Public: This Virtual Contributor can be invited to all Spaces on Alkemio
visibility.private: Private: This Virtual Contributor can be invited to spaces within my account.
visibility.hidden: Hidden: This Virtual Contributor cannot be invited.

ingestion.title: Body of Knowledge
ingestion.infoText: By clicking the button below, you will make sure your Virtual Contributor is based on the latest knowledge in the Subspace.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.tooltip1: Public: When users visit {{vcName}}'s profile, they can see the content of its body of knowledge.
privacy.tooltip2: Private: Only the account admins can see the content of the body of knowledge.

noAccess.title: Private Virtual Contributor Knowledge
noAccess.description: You don't have access to the knowledge base of this Virtual Contributor. Please contact the owner of the Virtual Contributor for more information.

your-credentials.title: My Verifiable Credentials
your-credentials.description: Alkemio caches your verifiable credentials in your cloud hosted wallet. The credentials you share will grant you privileges in communities across the platform.

authentication-required.header: The page you are trying to reach requires you to be logged in.

help-dialog.title: Looking for help?
help-dialog.text: We're here to help you make the most of the Alkemio platform and create an impact on the topics you care about. Click below to find answers, contact our team, or get started!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Looking for tips & tricks? Find them in the blog posts here!

forum.title: Welcome to the Alkemio Forum
forum.subtitle: Connect with others, ask questions, and stay updated with Alkemio's release notes

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Please enter a new password within the next 15 minutes to complete your password reset.
messages.verification-flow-expired: The verification link has expired. Please request a fresh one by submitting your email once again.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one by submitting your email once again.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: You're trying to sign in with a LinkedIn/Microsoft account, but the associated email address was already used before. Please sign in with this e-mail address and password or try to reset the password. If that doesn't work, please send an email to support@alkem.io.
messages.invalid-credentials: The email address or password you inserted is invalid. Please check your credentials and try again. Are you trying to sign up instead? You can do so by clicking the link above.

dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-create: No discussions available. Create a new discussion
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-join: No discussions available. Please join the community to create a discussion

type.title: Post label
type.help-text: What type of information do you want to share?

postLocation.title: Post location
postLocation.label: Contributing to Callout
postLocation.reminder: Be careful changing the Posts location. Moving the Post to another Callout will make it disappear from the current Callout. This might make it difficult for people, including the person who created this Post, to retrieve it. Note that you can only move Posts within the same Space or Subspace.
postLocation.success: Successfully moved Post to the new Callout.
postLocation.error: Something went wrong when moving the Post, please try again.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this Post?

associates-view.sign-in: Please sign in to see the users that are associated with this organization.

whiteboard.text: Card banner showing a preview of {{displayName}} whiteboard

terms.checkboxLabel: I have read and accept the <terms>terms and agreements (click here to open them)</terms> for creating a Space.
terms.dialogTitle: Terms and Conditions for creating a Space
terms.dialogContent: I understand that as a host, I am responsible for all content within the Space.
terms.fullTermsLink: Click here to read more about the Terms & Conditions.

plansTable.title: Choose a plan
plansTable.subtitle: To create a safe environment to train your Virtual Contributor, you first need to create a Space. Choose a plan for this Space below.
plansTable.seeMore: Click here for the full description of each plan

plans.name: SPACE_LICENSE_FREE
plans.disclaimer: Free Spaces are limited to 1 Space per user
plans.disabledDisclaimer: Each user can have 1 free space. It seems like you’ve already used yours!

freeTrial.title: Free trial
freeTrial.content:
Try our free 30-day trial of the Plus license to unlock exciting features like creating Virtual Contributors and multi-user whiteboard editing. No payment details required! After the trial, choose between upgrading to Plus or continuing with the Free license.

Questions? [Contact our support team anytime](https://welcome.alkem.io/contact).

getStarted.title: Get started right away!
getStarted.content: Since we don’t want to hold you up any longer, you receive a 30-day free trial. After these 30 days we will ask you to set up your account details in order to continue using your Space. If you have any questions, feel free to contact support here.

virtualContributorSpaceSettings.name: Name
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.infoTextBoK: Select the Subspace you want as a body of knowledge for this Virtual Contributor
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.noSubspacesInfo: Create a Subspace first, and populate it with the relevant information for your Virtual Contributor.

confirmDeletion.description: Do you want to delete this {{entity}}? This action is irreversible. All profile information will be removed and people will no longer be able to interact with the {{entity}}

createVirtualContributorWizard.noSpaces: Couldn't find any Space hosted by you, please contact us for support.

autoCreated.subSpaceTagline: A Knowledge Base of a Virtual Contributor

initial.title: Create a Virtual Contributor
initial.profileDescription: Choose a name and enrich your Virtual Contributors profile below.
initial.description: A Virtual Contributor allows you to interact with AI on Alkemio. What do you want to make available through your Virtual Contributor?
initial.useExistingSpace: The content of a (Sub)Space on Alkemio

loadingInfo.vcSpaceCreation: A Space for interaction with your Virtual Contributor is being built. This process may take a few moments to complete.

cancel.title: Discard Virtual Contributor
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to stop creating your Virtual Contributor? Your work will not be saved.

addContent.title: Add knowledge
addContent.description: What knowledge do you want your Virtual Contributor to have? Write it down in posts or upload it in documents.
addContent.descriptionBold: You can update, add, and remove content later.

post.title: Post title
post.exampleDescription: Tip: Create a structured and specific text, for example: Background Alkemio, founded in 2020, was born out of frustration with slow progress on COVID-related challenges and a recognition of the numerous fast-moving challenges we face daily. Governance To maintain trust and realize our long-term vision, we’ve adopted Steward Ownership as our core group structure. Steward ownership is...
post.tooltip: More posts can be added in the Body of Knowledge once the VC is created

documents.tooltip: Supported file formats: Text on websites, .pdf, .doc(x), .xls(x). Maximum file size: 20mb

addContent.submitDisabled: Add at least one Post to continue

create.title: Create Virtual Contributor with an External AI
create.subTitle: Choose a provider and enter your API Key or token to connect your external AI to a Virtual Contributor

provider.title: Provider
provider.placeholder: Select a provider from this list

comingSoon.title: 🚀 Coming soon!
comingSoon.subTitle: Looking for a different AI service? Let us know!

input.label: AI Service
input.placeholder: E.g. the AI that xx created to xx

contactOptions.title: May we contact you if we have questions about the way you want to use this AI service?

trySection.title: 👍That’s it!
trySection.subTitle: To start interacting, simply type @{{vcName}} in a comment. Give it a try in the preview below.
trySection.postDescription: At Alkemio, we utilize Posts to facilitate collaborative interactions with AI. Unlike private chats, other members within a Space can learn from and contribute to these interactions. Similar to mentioning a human contributor, you can use the ‘@’ symbol followed by the Virtual Contributor’s name.

tryInfoSection.title: 👍That’s it!
tryInfoSection.description:
Your Virtual Contributor is ready! To start interacting, invite the Virtual Contributor to a space and once it’s a member, simply type @{{vcName}} in a comment.

Enjoy!

existingSpace.title: Choose a (Sub)Space
existingSpace.description: Which Space or Subspace do you want to bring to life with the Virtual Contributor? Below you'll be able to choose from all Spaces and Subspaces that you are host of.
existingSpace.label: (Sub)Space
existingSpace.noSpaces: You need to be an admin of a Space to proceed with this option. To create a Virtual Contributor without a Space, please go back and follow the Written Knowledge flow.

chooseCommunity.title: Hello, {{vcName}}!
chooseCommunity.description: Your Virtual Contributor is ready! To start interacting, your Virtual Contributor should be added to a Space. Select one below, or continue without. In that case you will have to add the VC manually through the Community tab of a Space.
chooseCommunity.label: Space
chooseCommunity.createAndAddToCommunity: Create, add, and go to Space

confirm.title: Continue without Space membership
confirm.description: A Virtual Contributor can only interact within a Space. Are you sure you want to proceed without adding them to a Space? You can still invite the Virtual Contributor later through the Space’s Community tab.
